name: getting-started
description: The repository for the Fabric Composer Getting Started application

scripts.preinstall: composer --version || { echo 'Please first run npm install -g composer-cli' ; exit 1;}
scripts.test: mocha --recursive && npm run bootstrapAssets && npm run listAssets && npm run submitTransaction
scripts.submitTransaction: node cli.js landregistry submit && node cli.js landregistry list
scripts.createNetwork: composer archive create --sourceName digitalproperty-network --sourceType module --archiveFile digitalPropertyNetwork.bna
scripts.postinstall: npm run download && npm run createProfile && npm run startHLF && npm run createNetwork && npm run deployNetwork

author: Author
